sub_title: Software Quality Assurance Test Engineer at Basic Fit
summary: SDET/Test Automation Engineer proficient in various testing tools and methodologies. IT Technologies are an iessential part of my daily life . I love learning more about it and also improving myself in software automation testing.

treasury_media.title: CertificateOfCompletion_API Testing Foundations.pdf
treasury_media.description:
Learning objectives
-Reviewing API terminology
-Mitigating risks related to testing APIs
-Mapping out the layout of an API
-API authorization and authentication
-Finding and using bearer tokens
-Testing GET, POST, PUT, and DELETE calls
-Using mocks, stubs, and fakes in API testing
-Testing microservices and the Internet of Things

treasury_media.title: CertificateOfCompletion_AWS Storage and Data Management.pdf
treasury_media.description: Amazon Web Services offers solutions that are ideal for managing data on a sliding scale—from small businesses to big data applications. This course teaches system administrators the intermediate-level skills they need to successfully manage data in the cloud with AWS: configuring storage, creating backups, enforcing compliance requirements, and managing the disaster recovery process.

treasury_media.title: CertificateOfCompletion_Scrum Advanced (1).pdf
treasury_media.description:
Learning objectives
-Adding finesse to your scrum
-The product owner and scrum master roles
-The relationship between the product owner and scrum master
-Product owner as business representative
Product owner as a team's business guide
-Scrum master as team advocate
-The forming and storming stages of team development
-Taking a team from norming to performing
-Scrum master as team guardian

profile_positions.description:
October 2020 - Present 
-Successfully created detailed, comprehensive, and well-structured Test Plans and Test Cases to ensure maximum test coverage and improved test efficiency. 
-Developed Cucumber BDD Test Automation Framework from scratch using Selenium WebDriver, TestNG, Maven-based on Page Object Model to improve all stakeholders' collaboration and easily engage in product development.
 -Using locators to find the web elements in Selenium and implementing waits. 
-Performed remote execution of daily Smoke Tests with Jenkins and sent email reports to ensure that the software's major functions were functioning properly.
 -Implemented Java, Selenium WebDriver to automate Scenarios written in Gherkin syntax, ensuring minimal manual intervention and code reusability. 
-Created many Test Cases such as Smoke, Functionality, Positive, Negative, and Regression Testing.
-Logged defects, monitored their status, and tracked them to ensure successfully closing Jira tickets. 
-Created SQL queries for validating the data in the database. 
-Use Git as the Version Control tool. 
-Created HTML reports with detailed Test Steps and screenshots. 
-Performed API testing. Created JSON POST, GET and other requests for REST Assured services using Postman to assert responses. Experimenting Postman for API Automation testing by using JavaScript Snippets.
 -Experimenting Cypress Test Automation framework . 
-Interacted with business analysts and developers within the requirement analysis and design reviews.
profile_positions.title: SDET

profile_positions.description:
-Developed, implemented, and documented best practices for test automation using Test Automation Toolset; Java, Selenium WebDriver, Cucumber, JUnit , Maven, Jenkins, and Git.
-Developed Test Cases and performed Manual Testing to learn more about the user perspective of the application in development and to understand the problem comprehensively.
-Configured the pom.xml file dependencies and plugins for test compatibility.
-Performed Positive and Negative Testing by using Cucumber Scenario Outline for all possible valid and invalid credentials.
-Implemented Java, Selenium WebDriver to automate Scenarios written in Gherkin syntax, ensuring minimal manual intervention and code reusability. 
-Performed Back-end Testing by writing SQL queries and used JDBC libraries to ensure test coverage and find defects effectively in the early stages of product development. 
-Implemented Functional Testing Framework for all modules using Selenium WebDriver, along with JUnit Framework.
-Involved in logging and tracking defects using Jira. 
-Conducted Functional Testing, Regression Testing using Selenium with Data-Driven Framework.
-Experienced in Agile Testing methodology with Scrum Framework and attended Daily Stand-up, Sprint Planning, Sprint Grooming, Sprint Demo, and Sprint Retrospective meetings for each Sprint deliverables.
profile_positions.title: SDET/Test Automation Engineer

profile_positions.description: During this period, I got retired from my job due to political crisis in Turkey. I found online jobs as freelancer via internet an worked as “Social Media Evaluator in Appen Global”. I also worked as online Turkish tutor for a while. During this period, I also attended full stack SDET/ Test Automation Engineering Couse via zoom for a year. This course was very intensive course and I learned  core Java, Selenium WebDriver, Cucumber, TestNG, JUnit, Maven, Jenkins, Git, API, SQL , Cypress, Core AWS and additional current tools which are used for test automation.
profile_positions.title: Social Media Evaluator . Student -full stack SDET/ Test Automation Engineering Couse

profile_positions.description:
Worked as Transnational Organized Crime  Advisor in Tripoli-Libya ;
- Responsible for assisting the reform and restructuring process of Libya in coordination with the Ministry of Interior; specifically
the Organise Crime Department under the Crime Investigation Department (CID).
- Undertaking a comprehensive mapping and assessment of the existing capacity and competence levels of individuals within
the current CID; mainly to identify key professional and capability gaps throughout all aspects of institutionalizing Libyan Security Forces efforts.
-Implementing a consultation programme with key partners in determining an effective reform process for the police forces,
including civil society, encompassing a permanent dialogue with the staff in the Department of Organised Crime.
- Composing time stipulated propositions strategies, with concise implementation plans; including a methodological approach for
reform and restructuring the existing departmental model for the Organised Crime Department (OCD). This encompasses
measuring the capacity OCD to fulfill its mission and ensuring the confidence of the Libyan population in its ability to maintain
public order and security.
-Ensuring appropriate capacity development and assisting in reviewing and recommending programs and project proposals with
relevance to the activities within the remit of the Organised Crime Department. This entails providing trainig activities of CIDOCD,
and other duties stipulated by UNSMIL -Security Advisory Section.
profile_positions.title: Security Advisor
